body_html: Has anyone gotten weightnorm (wn) to work well with RNNs for RL? Using wn with RNNs seems to perform the same or worse than without (wn) for me. I've tried applying to GRU/LSTM such that wn is used separately each component of weight matrices (6 components for GRU & 8 for LSTM) and tried applying wn to the whole (2) weight matrices.

body: Has anyone gotten weightnorm (wn) to work well with RNNs for RL? Using wn with RNNs seems to perform the same or worse than without (wn) for me. I've tried applying to GRU/LSTM such that wn is used separately each component of weight matrices (6 components for GRU & 8 for LSTM) and tried applying wn to the whole (2) weight matrices.
